creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: Red and black pattered ground with light brown supplementary weft patterning; panels of beadig in a net-like pattern on front and back, small sections of beaded pattern at sides, below arm holes.
medium: Cotton, shells, beads; supplementary weft patterning, beading; needlework
title: Woman's Blouse
